text: Kya yeh log kabhi zameen mein chaley phiray nahin hain ke inhein un logon ka anjaam nazar aata jo insey pehle guzar chuke hain? Woh insey zyada taaqatwar thay aur insey zyada zabardast aasaar zameen mein chodh gaye hain. Magar Allah ne unke gunahon par unhein pakad liya aur unko Allah se bachane wala koi na tha
